overview.en: LDC adopts DDPOS consensus protocol, combines the market advanced open source Graphene scheme and fragmentation technology. As an asset trading agreement based on block chain 4.0, LDC high-speed public chain will build a whole-domain ecosystem covering 'gold stable currency + decentralized gold exchange + merchant payment system' in the future.
overview.zh: LDC采用DDPOS共识协议，结合市场上先进的开源Graphene方案和分片技术。LDC高速公链作为基于区块链4.0的资产交易协议，未来将打造涵盖“黄金稳定币+去中心化黄金交易所+商户支付系统”的区块链全领域生态。
